name: Zombie Busters VR
description:
- The professional zombie eradication task force 'Zombie Busters ‘
- There's a rumor that there's a lot of zombies on the ruined 501 Street...Now,
why don't we go out hunting zombies?
- Increased game quality by the appearance of various monsters with
individuality. Increasing game immersion with the appearance of individual
bosses in all four rounds. Obtain a random item box in the middle of
game play, change various weapons and use them.
